feature_model.name: JAVA Inline Variablity Model

meta.data: This feature model encodes the variability of java inlining options.

feature_model.feature_tree: :r Java Inline Variability(root) :g (FreqInlineSize) [1,1] : FreqInlineSize 160(FIS_160) : FreqInlineSize 325(FIS_325) : FreqInlineSize 700(FIS_700) : FreqInlineSize 1400(FIS_1400) : FreqInlineSize 2800(FIS_2800) :g (InlineSmallCode) [1,1] : InlineSmallCode 500(ISC_500) : InlineSmallCode 1000(ISC_1000) : InlineSmallCode 2000(ISC_2000) : InlineSmallCode 4000(ISC_4000) : InlineSmallCode 8000(ISC_8000) :g (MaxInlineLevel) [1,1] : MaxInlineLevel 9(MIL_9) : MaxInlineLevel 18(MIL_18) : MaxInlineLevel 36(MIL_36) : MaxInlineLevel 72(MIL_72) : MaxInlineLevel 144(MIL_144) :g (MaxInlineSize)[1,1] : MaxInlineSize 20(MIS_20) : MaxInlineSize 35(MIS_35) : MaxInlineSize 70(MIS_70) : MaxInlineSize 140(MIS_140) : MaxInlineSize 280(MIS_280) :g (MaxRecursiveInlineLevel) [1,1] : MaxRecursiveInlineLevel 1(MRL_1) : MaxRecursiveInlineLevel 10(MRL_10) : MaxRecursiveInlineLevel 100(MRL_100) : MaxRecursiveInlineLevel 1000(MRL_1000) : MaxRecursiveInlineLevel 10000(MRL_10000) :g (MinInliningThreshold) [1,1] : MinInliningThreshold 1(MIT_1) : MinInliningThreshold 30(MIT_30) : MinInliningThreshold 50(MIT_50) : MinInliningThreshold 100(MIT_100) : MinInliningThreshold 250(MIT_250) :m ReservedCodeCacheSize 2500k(ReservedCodeCacheSize) :m CodeCacheMinimumFreeSpace 100k(CodeCacheMinimumFreeSpace)
